name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with over 13 years of experience ensuring the quality and high-performance of applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **Selenium**, **Playwright**, and **Cypress**, with a strong background in CI/CD workflows utilizing tools such as **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, **Jenkins**, and **Bitbucket**. Experienced in data-driven testing methodologies, leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and building REST APIs to enhance application reliability.
Skilled in both manual and automated testing strategies, with expertise in testing frameworks like **JUnit** and **Appium** for mobile and web applications. Proven track record in maintaining compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS through structured testing lifecycles (STLC) and tools including **TestRail**, **Xray**, and project management platforms like **Jira** and **Monday**.
In-depth understanding of Agile methodologies and DevOps principles, driving continuous improvement in software testing processes. Passionate about delivering high-quality software through effective collaboration and leveraging cloud services on **Azure**.
